overview:
Harry is an internet marketing expert, successful entrepreneur, and a leading eBusiness strategist and consultant. With a wealth of online advertising, marketing and sales knowledge Harry brings his proven online marketing experience to Qwik Media Inc. to develop effective, results driven advertising campaigns for our clients.

Harry has extensive knowledge in dealing with online advertising platforms such as Lead Generation, CPA, Coreg, Search Engine Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing and more online marketing techniques. Harry has the experience needed to guide clients through advertising initiatives to achieve the clients optimal ROI.
